item.description:
INFORMAL MEETUP at the Dolphin Restaurant for Drinks & Entertainment with Livin' Las Vegas


BRING YOUR FRIENDS, BRING YOUR SPOUSE, BOYFRIEND, OR WHOMEVER!


I thought I'd share this Venue with my group for a few reasons:


#1. Livin' Las Vegas is is a dynamic duo, Miami Mike Marnier and Little Eddie Chivas who team up as Livin' Las Vegas. The duo re-creates the feel of a '60s lounge act, but adds hits by Billy Joel and Harry Connick Jr. with hits from the 70s, & 80 and with much, much more! Phenomenal Entertainers!

#2. I want to keep it informal because the Dolphin Restaurant is cozy. I won't be able to reserve a table because we're not eating. We can grabs seats as they vacate! I've done this before. . .Plus there is a bar with seating. . . Livin' Las Vegas is so much fun. I've never seen any entertainers like them!

#3. I'm going to be there anyway. It's also my Birthday. It would be great to share it with some familiar faces! The more, the Merrier!

NOTE: There is Parking in the Back of the Restaurant. . .
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be Wearing My Infamous Pink Hat!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Entertainment by "Livin' Las Vegas" at the Dolphin Restaurant in Barnstable
